Welcome to Coral

Coral is a cohort analysis tool to interactively create and refine multiple cohorts,
while visualizing their provenance in the Cohort Evolution Graph.
The resulting cohorts can then be compared, characterized, and inspected down to the level of single entities.

Coral contains data from the AACR Project GENIE, The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA), the Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia (CCLE),
as well as two depletion screen data sets from McDonald et al. (Cell 2017) and Meyers et al. (Nat. Genet. 2017).
